pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Zi-O (2018, TV show)$(br2)Used alongside the $(l:zi_o/devices/armor)Zi-O armor$(/l) to transform into $(l:zi_o/riders/woz)Kamen Rider Woz$(/l)$(br2)Can store up to 4 stacks of Miridewatches
Drops from:$(li)$(l:zi_o/mobs/woz)Kamen Rider Woz (White Woz)$(/l)'s equipment
